winter
summer

autumn
There are 4 buttons showing the seasons. We are on Autumn, please change the season to Summer
There are several shapes. You need to drag the triangle into the red square on the left
Now, you need to enlarge the triangle by spreading two fingers on the shape
Now, change the season to Winter
Please draw an X shape
The trial is over. Thank you very much for your cooperation
Please write in the box below what you think about the task. To close the keyboard, press the keyboard image. When finished, press the X button
